pros: Calm, relaxed environment. Strong synergy between the development and design teams.
cons: Most work is conducted through Slack, some projects can get disorganized due to employees in different time zones.

pros:
- Great team of developers with a wide range of experience
- Flat and transparent company structure, easy to get involved with different tasks
- Relaxed environment and lenient with working from home, as most work and conversation is done over Slack
- Open and flexible offices with room to grow
- Solid benefits
cons: - The company is split between Louisville and DC, with many people working remotely or often from home. While the option is great, it can limit company culture.

pros: Loved working so closely with other developers
cons: Sometimes could not get as much guidance as I needed
